location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter states that Bushire's annual books up to April are enclosed. The letter also reports news from Schiras [Shiraz] that 3,000 troops had marched from there to Isfahan, making a Persian force of 24,000 that will march on to Bagdat [Baghdad]. Shipped by Jumma's Boat.
